thread.title: BRIEF-U.S. Silica Holdings Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.88

title: BRIEF-U.S. Silica Holdings Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.88
text: February 21, 2018 / 11:50 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-U.S. Silica Holdings Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.88 Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - U.S. Silica Holdings Inc: * U.S. SILICA HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.88 * Q4 BASIC ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.52 * ‍FOR Q1, EXPECT THAT VOLUMES AND PRICING IN OIL & GAS WILL BE FLAT COMPARED WITH Q4 OF 2017​ * ANTICIPATES THAT ITS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR 2018 WILL BE IN RANGE OF $300 MILLION TO $350 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.54 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FOR Q1, EXPECT VOLUMES AND PRICING IN OIL & GAS WILL BE FLAT COMPARED WITH Q4 OF 2017 * QTRLY TOTAL SALES $360.6 MILLION VERSUS $182.4 MILLION * U.S. SILICA HOLDINGS Q4 REVENUE $360.6 MILLION, UP 98 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
